com.appliancestudio.jbluez
Class InquiryInfo

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.appliancestudio.jbluez.InquiryInfo
public class InquiryInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Stores the results of an HCI inquiry. Each result is an InquiryInfoDevice object.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Edward Kay, ed.kay@appliancestudio.com

          The number of devices that responded.
